# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/cropperjs`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for cropperjs (https://github.com/fengyuanchen/cropperjs).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/cropperjs
